categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's Twenty-First went on a mission to the planet Bestine IV as a part of a coordinated final effort to distract forces of the Galactic Empire and allow the Alliance Fleet to complete its withdrawal from the Mid Rim. News of the Twenty-First's efforts eventually reached the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry. One of the company's sergeants, Maximian Ajax, told the news to First Sergeant Hazram Namir during a conversation about the distraction effort.
The mission to Bestine IV was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
